1340440.short_desc: Lost is a with Chinese style mysterious unreal story is setting, contain all sorts of Chinese style ghost legend and content card card player of Rougelike adventure game ACTS the vagabonder that loses memory, set foot on unknown journey.

1340860.name: 灰烬行星与填鸭少女
1340860.short_desc: 在河北省，核大战后孤独的世界末日，机器人守卫在尘封的考场。 长久的等待之后，全国最后一名考生探出了路口。 再过一年的六月六，高考结束之后，在这个一片荒芜的世界，两人又该何去何从……

1341690.name: 异界大陆20000金币
1341690.short_desc: 每次游戏一开始就可以多拥有10000金币，不推荐购买

1344320.name: 端木斐异闻录：深海魆蜮
1344320.short_desc: The human heart is dark, like the strange aliens that dwell deep beneath the calm sea. The darkness rushes out through the void of the mind, and tragedy begins....

1372670.short_desc: Life is short. Time is precious. Can you discover and solve the mysterious sequence of puzzles that will save the world before you are... eighty-sixed?

1384380.name: KUUKIYOMI 2: Consider It More! - New Era
1384380.short_desc: New situations added. A game that determines whether you have the skills to be considerate in this new world.

1389490.name: 异界大陆30000金币
1389490.short_desc: 游戏初始能获得30000金币，不是必须买的，建议自己肝

1389491.name: 异界大陆40000金币
1389491.short_desc: 游戏初始能获得40000金币，不建议购买，建议自己慢慢肝过去

1389492.name: 异界大陆50000金币
1389492.short_desc: 每次游戏一开始就可以多拥有50000金币，不推荐购买

1389493.name: 异界大陆60000金币
1389493.short_desc: 每次游戏一开始就可以多拥有60000金币，不推荐购买

1397010.short_desc: Welcome to the 1980s! This is a city which just started to develop, and you're in charge of this small urban village. How will the city's future be tied to this place? Manage your land, construct new buildings, explore the stories, and find out the ultimate fate of this urban village!

1403750.name: 街机金蟾捕鱼2
developers: 郑州百易科技有限公司
publishers: 郑州百易科技有限公司
1403750.short_desc: 多样玩法：【免费福利】每日登陆海量免费福利，领到手软；【简单易赢】操作简单，无需氪金，免费赢赢赢，千万金币唾手可得；【比赛竞技】真人实时对战，弹头大奖争先抢；【超高倍大BOSS】超高倍率，玩法新颖，打到绝对赚到，必须一拼；【独特画风】古老部落，异域埃及，这里统统都有；丰富赛制：每天11-23点开启大奖挑战赛，夺宝奇兵，弹头部落独特玩法全天开放中

1426570.name: Space Station 51
1426570.short_desc: You are a member of Space Station 51. When you wake up, you find that a zombie virus has broken out on the space station. You need to follow the command of the station master and take a series of actions.

1437830.name: Heroes of the Three Kingdoms 2
1437830.short_desc: 《三国群英传Ⅱ》是由奥汀科技运营研发的一款即时战略游戏。于1999年发行，为《三国群英传》系列游戏作品的第二部。游戏开创性地在此类游戏中引入了即时战略的时间概念、独特的内政和作战模式、动听的CD音轨以及华丽的背景地图。

1437840.name: Heroes of the Three Kingdoms 3
1437840.short_desc: 《三国群英传Ⅲ》是三国群英传系列第三部作品。游戏拥有壮丽的战争场面，战争兵数最多可增加到800人，且战斗受不同地形影响。画面镜头可自行调整，方便玩家调兵遣将。

1437850.name: Heroes of the Three Kingdoms 4
1437850.short_desc: 《三国群英传IV》是由奥汀科技研发的一款即时战略类游戏，是三国群英传系列的第四作。玩家将在游戏中重历三国时代，指挥武将驰骋于华夏神州大地之上，征战于天南地北之间，平定乱世，以一统中原为目标，最终建立属于自己的英雄事业。

1437860.name: Heroes of the Three Kingdoms 5
1437860.short_desc: 《三国群英传Ⅴ》是由宇峻奥汀研发的一款即时战略类游戏，也是三国群英传系列的第五部作品 。 玩家在游戏中将扮演三国时期的君主，调兵遣将、攻城掠池。画面清晰度全面升级至1024*768分辨率，并实现千人同屏的超大型战役。

1437870.name: Heroes of the Three Kingdoms 6
1437870.short_desc: 《三国群英传Ⅵ》是由奥汀科技研发的一款即时战略类游戏，是三国群英传系列的第六作。 游戏中精心安排了许多剧情事件，并设计了繁多的兵种，让玩家在游戏中可获得千人作战的畅快，也可体验运筹帷幄的快乐。

1437880.name: Heroes of the Three Kingdoms 7
1437880.short_desc: 《三国群英传Ⅶ》由宇峻奥汀研发，是三国群英传系列第七作。游戏内除了拥有系列作中广受好评的千人战之外，全新升级了武将技，添加更多的战略系统，在武器的合成、士兵的强化等方面都做了全新的设计。藉以触动玩家每一根运筹帷幄的思考神经，挑战玩家战术运用的极致。

1447190.name: Vladimir 2021
1447190.short_desc: Vladimir 2021 is a visual novel game. In it, you will immerse yourself in a short story of the protagonist, whose fate will be decided by your choice. - Interesting and "deep" music - Beautiful design of the game - Short but thought-provoking story

1457630.name: 幻想三国志2
1457630.short_desc: 本作是角色扮演系列单机游戏《幻想三国志》的第二部。本作故事约发生在一代10年前左右，时值公元196年。董卓旧部李傕、郭氾势力被灭，曹操迁献帝于许都。玩家将扮演主角楚歌——一个立志成为天下第一有钱人的穷困少年，从当时为马腾势力的西凉召德村中，展开一段乱世中的冒险。

1457640.name: 幻想三国志3
1457640.short_desc: 本作是角色扮演系列单机游戏《幻想三国志》的第三部，背景设定在东汉光和年间，故事发生在二代的十数年前，即黄巾之乱前后。本作剧情走向延续前作独特世界观，发展全新主角群的故事。全新的双主角路线以及3D战斗的场面。带来了新系统的创新及优化，如秘邑系统、boss放大系统、敌人后援系统、武器纸娃娃系统等为为游戏带来全新的体验。

1457650.name: 幻想三国志4
1457650.short_desc: 故事背景设定在第一代的约十年之后，除了开展系列作中最新进展的剧情，也继承了前几代三国战役及独特的世界观，历史人物、军师猛将也在此代出现。

1457660.name: 幻想三国志4外传
1457660.short_desc: 角色扮演游戏《幻想三国志》的最终回。补完《幻想三国志4》在剧情中没有交代的情结，以及以楼澈为主的全新剧情故事，包括他如何来到人间，如何与紫丞相遇及其与紫丞分开后的故事。添加了新的战斗人物以及全新的宝袋系统和原创剧情，战斗阵型也可自行设定从而达到出奇制胜的效果。

1471970.name: 祛魅·教化（祛魅1）- 豪华礼包
1471970.short_desc: 豪华版在本体基础版本之上，新增了大量豪华强化礼包，整合手机版本全部福利包内容。释放自我，轻松挑战极限难度。

1507920.name: Alien world Millionaire - Character 1
1507920.short_desc: This is a free test of the new character model package, a total of 6 new free characters.

1508660.name: 正宗台灣十六張麻將2
1508660.short_desc: 大宇1997年出品的１６張麻將遊戲，以台灣最常見的打法與計台方式為準。並將各種計台方式和規則都考慮進去，提供玩家各式的選擇，以符合自己打牌的習慣。遊戲提供自由對戰、雀壇風雲、群龍爭霸等三種模式。

1508670.name: 正宗台湾十六张麻将3
1508670.short_desc: *** This game is only available in Chinese ***《正宗麻将3》提供了自由对战、竞赛制的群龙争霸、以及剧情模式的雀坛风云三种玩法。15位每个都各有其对应的语音，打牌时的仿真程度颇高。玩家也能自己设定计台规则，或更改为十三张台型。此外，游戏另行提供了五个简单的赌博游戏，供玩家们在打牌间隙轻松一下。

1512520.short_desc: It's a nice puzzle to move the same numbers next to each other.

1525860.name: Touhou Blooming Chaos 2 - Chara Pack 1:Remilia Scarlet/Komeji Satori/Aki Sizuha/Tsukumo Benben/Yorigami Shion
1525860.short_desc: This DLC is an optional playable character pack for Touhou Blooming Chaos, including Remilia Scarlet,Komeji Satori,Aki Sizuha,Tsukumo Benben and Yorigami Shion. Once purchased, you may use them and all their color palettes in game immediately. Hope you enjoy.

1526620.name: Touhou Blooming Chaos 2 - Chara Pack 2:Flandre Scarlet/Komeji Koishi/Aki Minoriko/Tsukumo Yatsuhashi/Yorigami Jyoon
1526620.short_desc: This DLC is an optional playable character pack for Touhou Blooming Chaos, including Flandre Scarlet,Komeji Koishi,Aki Minoriko,Tsukumo Yatsuhashi and Yorigami Jyoon. Once purchased, you may use them and all their color palettes in game immediately. Hope you enjoy.

1526710.name: Touhou Blooming Chaos 2 - Chara Pack 3:Yukari Yakumo/Eirin Yagokoro/Yasaka Kanako/Junko/Kazami Yuka
1526710.short_desc: This DLC is an optional playable character pack for Touhou Blooming Chaos, including Yukari Yakumo,Eirin Yagokoro,Yasaka Kanako,Junko and Kazami Yuka. Once purchased, you may use them and all their color palettes in game immediately. Hope you enjoy.

1526720.name: Touhou Blooming Chaos 2 - Chara Pack 4:Ibuki Suika/Ibaraki Kasen/Shikieiki/Hinanawi Tenshi/Hata no Kokoro
1526720.short_desc: This DLC is an optional playable character pack for Touhou Blooming Chaos, including Ibuki Suika,Ibaraki Kasen,Shikieiki,Hinanawi Tenshi and Hata no Kokoro. Once purchased, you may use them and all their color palettes in game immediately. Hope you enjoy.

1544860.short_desc: Climatic side scroller where history plot intermingles with Slavic legends, Second World War, and paranormal activity. Solve complex puzzles, do some platforming, interact with various characters, discover their unclear motives, and be a part of the dark and forgotten mystery.

1549240.name: 扫雷冒险谭2 ~露露姆的冒险~
1549240.short_desc: 因为某个事件，诺鲁鲁村的人们来到南方避难。 在事情平息下来之后正当回乡之际，却不料归途上布满了地雷。 为了带领大家安全地回到村子， 机器人露露姆开始了扫雷的冒险历程。

1566680.name: Still Model 3
1566680.short_desc: · A simulation bondage art, and beautiful models appointment, together with the photography game.

1570760.name: Variables 2
1570760.short_desc: After two years of precipitation, we re-made this variable sequel after thinking about it! Variable 2 is a unique stand-alone tower defense game. We have enriched the building and elements of tower defense, and the experience in the game can be changed according to your ideas!

1585610.name: 大航海時代30周年記念 サウンドトラック全曲集

1589890.name: 便利商店‪6
1589890.short_desc: 打造最輕鬆易玩的經營遊戲 ! 建設最有特色的【 便利商店 】! 玩家可以輕輕鬆鬆來經營一家或多家【 便利商店 】的模擬遊戲小品，透過不同的地區選擇、裝潢、擺設、貨架、請人、進貨及宣傳等等，都可以由自己隨意處理，享受一個更易玩的經營作品。

1593280.name: 8089: The Next Action RPG
1593280.short_desc: 8089 is a fully featured, open world procedural action RPG with randomly generated enemies, items and quests. Customize futuristic weapons with endless combinations in this fun game that doesn't take itself too seriously! VR is fully supported, but not required

1611660.name: 本源行者1900
1611660.short_desc: In "Tao Traveller 1900", you will come to a world where reality and legends are intertwined. Exploring the secrets behind the decay and turmoil as the "yihana" in the chaotic era. Touch the profoundness of Chinese culture, Feel the characters and how everything changes in two realities ......

1642840.name: 我16岁辍学做游戏！
1642840.short_desc: 《我16岁辍学做游戏！》是一款双结局的游戏开发模拟游戏。讲述一位16岁学生在辍学游戏开发和正常上学导致的不同结局。 制作目的是为了给对独立游戏行业一无所知的人指引一条正确的道路。

1647250.name: KUUKIYOMI 3: Consider It More and More!! - Father to Son
1647250.short_desc: Third time's a charm. This is a game that checks your ability to be considerate to attain happiness.

1655230.name: 便利商店6-電子攻略本
1655230.short_desc: *** 官方攻略本 *** 曾風迷全台的【便利商店】模擬經營遊戲讓大家一圓店長的夢想；2014年最新版【便利商店6】玩家將再度進入【便利商店】考驗你的經營管理能力，透過不同的地區選擇、裝潢、擺設、貨架、員工派任、進貨及宣傳等等，一手由你隨心掌控，你準備好進入【便利商店】一展長才！

1657950.name: PrototypeOutpost3
1657950.short_desc: A third-person shooter game, play the protagonist, walk in this apocalypse that has nothing to do with you, and experience the truth behind it.

1663300.name: Touhou Blooming Chaos 2 - Chara Pack Special:Mystia Lorelei
1663300.short_desc: Mystia Lorelei’s expansion pack is a collaboration with our new game Touhou Mystia’s Izakaya, you will be able to use Mystia Lorelei in game.We recommend you get this DLC for free by playing the game for 120 minutes.

1674340.name: 仙侠世界2
1674340.short_desc: 《仙侠世界2》是以次世代引擎开发的正统仙侠类题材MMORPG，捏脸、副本、攻城等玩法一应俱全。游戏开放全场景自由飞行，所有野外和城市场景均可飞行。凭借高清的引擎表现，实现了全方位“飞行赏景”。游戏主要玩法依托于家族展开，玩家可自行建立家族参与争霸，也可与伙伴一起体验小团队战斗的乐趣。

1710390.name: いの べーしょん! 2007
1710390.short_desc: Steam port of "INO VATION! 2007" by Omega

1711610.name: Dungeon 100
1711610.short_desc: The dragon-slayer becomes the dragon. Create unique builds without having to grind for equipment. After defeating a dungeon boss, you will take its place. Then, defeat your past selves to descend further into the dungeon.

1711771.name: Kingdom Heroes 8  Create your own original officer character combinations.
1711771.short_desc: This expansion pack contains 12 new original officers: 5 Han males, 5 Han females, 1 Japanese male, and 1 Japanese female.

1711772.name: Kingdom Heroes 8 God Zhao Yun
1711772.short_desc: You can add special officer "God Zhao Yun" in "Kingdom Heroes 8"

1711773.name: 三国群英传8 芙蓉新裳
1711773.short_desc: You can change the art drawings of the famous officers, such as DiaoChan, Sun Shangxiang, and Peimi Hoo in "Kingdom Heroes 8".

1724860.name: 胡莱三国3
1724860.short_desc: 十年传承，再现经典！畅爽的大地图联盟国战，多地形策略，3D沙盘推演，写意的武将搜集，只为你还原真实的策略三国。

1732970.name: 中年失业模拟器-第3季
1732970.short_desc: 《中年失业模拟器》第三季DLC，经历了努力奋斗赚钱、克莱共和国冒险之后的阿巴，又将迎来怎样的挑战呢？来试试第三季吧！

1733940.name: 仙侠镇尘箓2
developers: 常州市华蓝德软件科技有限公司
publishers: 常州市华蓝德软件科技有限公司
1733940.short_desc: "Treasure Town 2"is a game that simulates the operation of a cultivation sect. Players can hire cultivators to explore secret realms, cultivate spiritual plants, or refine pills and magic treasures, ultimately enhancing the sect's reputation and becoming the first sect in the cultivation world.

1742450.name: 西游记2021
1742450.short_desc: This game takes Sun Wukong, Tang monk, pig Bajie, sand monk and little white dragon as the protagonists. 1798300.short_desc: 本遊戲以日治時期的小說家、影人劉吶鷗生平為故事文本，以臺灣文學館收藏劉吶鷗的麻將牌為關鍵道具，遊戲舞台從上海百樂門、天津萬國橋、黑龍江大興安嶺、北京明陵地宮到臺灣臺南州廳。在科幻背景中，使玩家進行一場益智解謎遊戲。

1805490.name: 问道仙途2

1805730.short_desc: 1919. Saboteurs organised an insolent provocation in revolutionary Novgorod. So called «miracle-making» relics of Saint Lukian were stolen right on the eve of being exposed and debunked in public. Our paper «The Red Case» is following the investigation.

1879640.name: 甜點王子2 典藏版
1879640.short_desc: 甜點王子2融合了戀愛養成與模擬經營，個性自然率真的女主為了實現甜點夢而搭乘飛行船環遊世界，並結識12星座男角。他們上船的理由千奇百怪，到底是心懷鬼胎還是有難言之隱？玩家在追求夢的同時，也探索夥伴們心中不為人知的秘密。遊戲中完整收錄了12段戀愛劇情、數百種令人垂涎欲的甜點與世界美食、以及琳琅滿目的主題家具服飾…

1926940.name: 失落的舰队：1658
1926940.short_desc: 1658年，在福建抗清的郑成功开始了第二次北伐，但突如其来的台风使郑军陷入了绝境。 胡寨主，一个郑军的小小千总，和他的舰队被台风卷到了南洋某个荒岛上，还活着。搁浅的舰队，陌生的岛屿，频乏的资源；不友好的当地土著，投机的海盗，纵横海上的红毛鬼……何去何从，这个岛上的故事会告诉你答案。

1926960.name: 失落的舰队：1658 先行测试版
1926960.short_desc: 这是一款以公元17世纪的南洋为背景的历史向冒险游戏。 1658年，在福建抗清的郑成功开始了第二次北伐，但突如其来的台风使郑军陷入了绝境。 胡寨主，一个郑军的小小千总，不知道是万幸还是不幸，和他的舰队被台风卷到了南洋某个荒岛上，还活着。搁浅的舰队，陌生的岛屿，频乏的资源并没有摧垮弟兄们；但不友好的当地土著，投机的海盗，还有纵横海上的红毛鬼却又刷新了胡寨主的世界观……何去何从，一切的一切，这个岛上的故事会告诉你答案。

Join xiuxian Zong Gate, experience the rich adventure map and real-time combat, gradually discover the truth of the earth and earth changes, change your fate.

PvP offers action-packed game modes set in a rigorously balanced competitive gameplay environment. Cooperative PvE gameplay throws you and your friends into wave after wave of merciless adversaries.

1980240.name: Ares Virus2
1980240.short_desc: The "Ares Virus" series of games is widely acclaimed for its unique combat and individual style of painting. Now that the sequel is back, it will give you an unprecedented experience.

1987630.short_desc: Psychedelic 3D maze-runner. Each level is more difficult than the last one. Fight an onslaught of enemies as you try to find your way to the center of the island. You play as a revenant, avenging your death, and trying to free your sister from prison.

2001460.name: 国際指定怪異123号 廃村
2001460.short_desc: 毎年出現する「廃村」と呼ばれる奇妙な無人村には、必ず１人の少女が生贄として幽閉される… 廃村に突入する３人の特殊部隊と、監禁された１人の少女を操作し、脱出を目指します。

2009390.name: 梦三国2
2009390.short_desc: 国风与电竞的碰撞、讲好三国故事。在梦三国游戏中玩家选择不同的三国英雄，参与各种PVP的竞技场的挑战或三国背景的PVE副本，通过团队、国家的配合以及个人的操作意识来击败对手，取得最终胜利。 梦三国2世界里，诸位三国名将的命运，历史如何演变，这一切将由玩家来亲身体验和作出抉择。

2010310.short_desc: Join 369 in an adventure full of excitement and fear and find your way through a dangerous labyrinth by destroying demonic creatures and solving various puzzles. 369 takes you with it and plunges you into the depth of a story full of excitement, apprehension and fear and shows you the way of life

2013120.short_desc: Detective visual novel about mysteries of rural Russian town in 90-s, anime style.

2020500.name: 風色幻想3:罪與罰的鎮魂歌
developers: 弘煜科技事業股份有限公司
2020500.short_desc: 风二发售之后的两年，于２００４年，搭配着全新３Ｄ引擎所推出的「风色幻想Ⅲ～罪与罚的镇魂歌～」。游戏本身在众多玩家的引颈期盼下，再次以战略角色扮演的方式呈现。由于本作品是风色全系列作里唯一以两个主角之观点来述说故事内容的革新之作。因此对该作品如此安排是否得当的赞否两论讨论也在当时讨论的十分火热．．。当然本作依然维持着风色系列优良剧本的传统，它交杂着私人友情与国家大义间挣扎的剧情，甚至还获得了当年「计算机玩家」所举办的『计算机玩家第八届游戏金像奖自制类最佳游戏剧本奖项』之肯定。

2020510.name: 風色幻想4:聖戰的終焉
developers: 弘煜科技事業股份有限公司
2020510.short_desc: 故事直接承续着风Ⅲ结局发展，甚至风Ⅲ的记录还能直接共享，可说是风色幻想系列作自Ⅰ代至今的「菲利斯多篇」之大完结。因此其内容除了有着超豪华的历代著名角色大集合外，贯穿数代间、延续千万年的层层谜题也在本作中逐一的解开，并引起诸多让人赞叹的游戏高潮，可说是风色幻想系列自风一推出以来的六年里，最为精彩且壮大的完结之作。

2020520.name: 風色幻想5:赤月戰爭
developers: 弘煜科技事業股份有限公司
2020520.short_desc: 在风色幻想前系列「菲利斯多篇」完美结束后的一年，由风色幻想原制作班底所全力打造，在故事与游戏设定内容上完全创新的全新作品。其中，双女主角的设定概念导入，加上轻小说式易读幽默又不失深刻设定的剧情内容、以及经由电子报形式发行的「弥赛亚公报」等等概念，都成功的让这款特别针对新一代玩家族群所精心设计的作品，在甫上市后便获得各大入口论坛的一致好评与推荐，也重新让风色系列在当时已日渐示微的单机游戏市场里，重新取得活力并开辟了另一片天空。

2020530.name: 風色幻想6:冒險奏鳴
developers: 弘煜科技事業股份有限公司
2020530.short_desc: 于２００７年暑假所推出的风色系列「赤与蓝的抉择篇」第二作。承继着系列作各代优点，加上已趋成熟的系统引擎，这套堪称风色系列最精典的巅峰作一上市便得到极大的人气回响，而且本代新导入的「羁绊对话系统」，也让玩家们终于可以自由的挑选同伴里头最为喜欢的角色进行对谈交心，并让结局产生数种不同分歧。另外，也因为其故事内容虽为前作故事发生的三年之后，但由于主要角色皆已不同之故，因此就算您是头一次接触风色系列，也能简单的融入其中。当然若玩家曾接触过前作（五代），那这些耳熟能详的冒险者们从五代至六代间的成长，亦是会让人感到加倍的感动．．．

2053940.name: Idol Hands 2
2053940.short_desc: Experience two different stories with two different heroines in this love-filled idol management game! Complete with Live 2D-animated H-Scenes!

2055390.name: 11号小镇综合症
2055390.short_desc: 欢迎来到11号小镇，在这个诡异的小镇里，您是一位新来的画家。为了完成镇上居民们的绘画委托，您需要收集对话中的关键词，将关键词提炼成绘画素材组合到画布上。面对居民们奇怪的委托，您能顺利完成作画并融入镇子，证明自己是“正常”的吗？

2072530.name: 无名之辈6-11关

2077490.short_desc: The player will play a person who survived the car accident, walking alone on the road, exploring in the dark forest, looking for the truth in the strange town, whether he really survived and walked out of the darkness in his heart is up to the player............

2140360.name: 控制论：年份游戏2022
2140360.short_desc: 这是一款关于2022这个年份的视觉小说，以我们所经历的2022的封闭与萧条为引言，长度约25分钟。它采用伪纪录片加旁白的形式，讲述的是一个在历史和现实中不断轮回的故事，由四条历史线构成，涉及到1894、1895、1911和2022几条历史线的循环。

2144700.name: 纸嫁衣3鸳鸯债-原画与设定集

This Setting Collections include the setting materials and original promotional paintings of Paper 3, the early concept art and the final product. Come on, we will take you into a more complete world of Paper Bride.

2147580.short_desc: 1990 is a fun, casual RPG with turn-based combat.

2167190.short_desc: You walk onto the veranda and watch your world fade away into nothingness. There is a scream. There is an explosion. There is a neon purple light. It is the beginning of your puzzle box mystery. It is the beginning of your sci-fi horror multi-reality. It is the beginning of 51:22:51.

2172290.name: 末日竟在我身边3 - 攻略图集

2180330.name: Girl's Way to Survive 2: Bloody Museum
2180330.short_desc: The sequel of the way for girls to survive has evolved from a static RPG to a dynamic 2d horizontal board pixel action game! You will continue to play (big chest and no brain) the pink hair giant breast girl - milk tea, and adventure in a bloody museum full of mysteries!

2184570.name: Memories Off #5 Togireta Film
2184570.short_desc: *This game is only available in Japanese, Traditional Chinese, and Simplified Chinese. 千羽谷大学の２年生「河合春人」は、映画作りという夢を目指して、小さな映画サークルに所属している。 だが春人は、１年前に親友「日名雄介」の死をきっかけに、その夢をあきらめかけていた。 そんな春人の前に突如現れた謎の女「仙堂麻尋」 彼女の登場で、「日名あすか」をはじめとする仲間たちとの間に、微妙な変化が訪れる……。 立ち止まったままの春人の胸にかけがえのない想いが宿るとき、途切れたフィルムは静かに回り出す。

2217270.name: 王子斗恶龙3 绝望

2225800.name: 3х9 Царство: Дорога приключений
2225800.short_desc: A good story about a brother and a sister looking for a way home through the 3х9 Kingdom. A fun storyline, instructive stories from characters, interesting logical puzzles, exciting mini-games, and more. Immerse yourself in the world of the old fairy tale in a new way!

2258590.name: 富甲天下3
2258590.short_desc: 重磅回歸、經典再現！以三國為背景的超人氣遊戲「富甲天下系列」，有別於傳統大富翁的進行模式，占領城池並非致勝的唯一手段，專心經營一座城池發展人口、稅收、士兵、特產品，透過四處經商、穿梭賭場來籌措資金，招募各種人才為己效力。待時機成熟招兵買馬、攻城掠地，一統天下！

2286770.name: Paper Bride 4 Bound Love

2308460.name: Zombie Survivors 1
2308460.short_desc: This is an action pigeon type bullet screen shooting game. Faced with a variety of zombies, players can shoot zombies with guns, blast them with grenades and oil barrels, and place walls to block zombies and bullets. In wave after wave of dead tide, trying to survive, win the game.

2321420.name: 房间的秘密2：起点
2321420.short_desc: 《房间的秘密2：起点》是由Noface工作室制作的非恐剧情向解谜游戏，也是《房间的秘密》的续作。甜美回忆的糖衣，可能包裹着难以想象的黑暗内幕。永远留在童年的美梦中？还是选择揭开真相？让我们回到故事的起点，从头开始这场冒险......

2329470.short_desc: Point-and-click RPG full of puzzles and tough enemies. You can decide to be good or bad in the game. Your decisions will define your future. Use your items wisely or suffer the consequences. “While I thought that I was learning how to live, I have been learning how to die.” - Leonardo da Vinci

2341920.name: 三國立志傳2

2349180.name: 空と無垢の6機

2385090.name: アパシー学校であった怖い話1995特別編

2390780.short_desc: 1984 is a first-person survival adventure set in Orwell's timeless dystopia. 2542430.short_desc: Each time you press the button, it will either double or lose all the points you’ve put in. How much will you risk?
